subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A proposal to move the swimming finals at the 2008 Beijing Olympics from the evening to morning hours to accommodate television viewers in the United States is meeting resistance from coaches and broadcasters in other parts of the world. The International Olympic Committee executive board is expected to discuss the request by NBC today, but a final decision is likely to be put off until later this year. The move would showcase swimming for eight nights in prime time in the United States but at less desirable times in Europe, Asia and Australia.
